name: Backend‑only FastAPI Example
description: Generate a lean FastAPI service (no frontend) so we can test the new dependency‑file logic.

steps.name: Create Minimal FastAPI Service
steps.prompt: Create a minimal FastAPI application that exposes CRUD endpoints for a `Todo` item (id, title, completed). Use an in‑memory list store, include Pydantic models, and add a basic pytest test. No database, no frontend, no Docker – keep it lean.
